name: Tarkus and the Crystal of Fear
overview: Tarkus and the Crystal of Fear is a platform game with arcade adventure elements. The protagonist of the game is a druid named Tarkus. To save the world Tarkus must acquire four Crystals of Fear. For this purpose Tarkus goes to the Land of Lakes. Each of the four lakes transfers to another realm: World of Stone, Crystal World, World of Magic, World of Gold. Tarkus may collect items and create spells, such as fly, armor, freefall, energy, freeze and transport. To create a spell Tarkus has to find the right items and put them in a pot in the World of Magic.
